name: @convex-dev/common
author: Convex, Inc.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-esm && npm run build-cjs
scripts.build-cjs: tsc --module commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --target es2015 && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json

readme:
# @convex-dev/common

Core code used by [convex](https://www.npmjs.com/package/convex).

This shouldn't be used as an immediate dependency of any end-user code.

Check out [the Convex documentation](https://docs.convex.dev) to learn more
about Convex!
